text: Epsilon Composite is a French company created in 1987 by Stephane LULL, its current CEO. Turnover in 2012 was 21M€ with 190 employees.Frédéric Parisot, Epsilon Composite inaugure une nouvelle usine en Gironde, L'Usine Nouvelle, September 21st 2012 Epsilon Composite produces a wide range of Carbon-fiber- reinforced polymer (CFRP) products for various applications:Colette Goinère, Epsilon Composite veut répondre aux marchés de l’aéronautique, L'Usine nouvelle, November 4th 2010.Airbus s'intéresse à Epsilon, Air et Cosmos n°2213, April 9th 2010, p.21Claude Mandraut, Epsilon Composite diversifie les applications de la fibre de carbone, La Tribune, may 14th 2010 * Manufacturing and printing machines (flexography and textile industries) * Energy (oil & gas offshore exploitation, wind turbines) * Civil Engineering * Camera support equipments (tripods) * Automotive and leisure applications * AerospaceFrédéric Parisot, Epsilon Composite inaugure une nouvelle usine en Gironde, L'Usine Nouvelle, September 21st 2012CORAC website The main production process used by the company is pultrusion. Epsilon Composite is mainly dealing with international customers (90% of the turnover comes from exports), mostly from Japan and Germany. The production site is located in Gaillan, France == References == == External links == * Category:Composite materials Category:Aerospace Category:Privately held companies of France Category:French companies established in 1987
title: Epsilon Composite
